output.name: compas_shapeop_dev
output.description: Python and C++ library integrating COMPAS with ShapeOp for mesh-based shape optimization and dynamics solving. Provides Python wrappers for the ShapeOp C++ library, mesh solver examples, and comprehensive documentation including API reference, development guide, and tutorials.

author.name: Petras Vestartas
author.contributionSummary: Project maintainer, primary developer of Python wrapper and examples
